data.content: Ramya's grandma gave her pretty, shiny, diamond earrings. They looked like stars. Do stars look like diamonds? Do diamonds look like stars?
Discuss with your partner and choose any one option.

content.name: What happened after Ramya sang "Twinkle twinkle"?
content.quesionTranscript: What happened after Ramya sang "Twinkle twinkle"?
content.modelAnsTranscript: A: Ramya took off her earrings and put them under her pillow. </br> B: Ramya saw a fairy in her dream who put the stars back in the sky.
content.instructions:
• Click ► to listen to two examples.
  • Take turns with your partner and describe any one feeling.
  • Use words and phrases from the word cloud given below.
  • When you and your partner are ready, click 'record'
  • If you want to hear your recording, click on the ►.
  • If you are happy with your recording, click on 'Save File'.

content.name: What do stars look like?
content.modelAnsTranscript: A: Stars look like diamonds. </br> B: Stars look like little lights in the sky.
content.quesionTranscript: What do stars look like?
